name: A Mobile Classic: Don't Tap The White Tiles - Piano Edition
name_original: A Mobile Classic: Don't Tap The White Tiles - Piano Edition
description: Don't Tap The White Tile became an instant classic almost overnight spawning a huge buzz among mobile gamers.  There have been many versions of this game but you can't ever forget the original. Play this endless masterpiece in its original form.  Take it for a spin but Don't Touch that White Tile!
